channel.title: How do i get weapons to be 2 handed?
channel.description: Okay well i added d claws and an elysian spirit shield ansd when i wear the d claws and shiweld they're both ion and i wanna make d claws 2 handed. I searched "2 hand" in client.java and then added the claws id to that void and i did the same with "two hand" so what do i do?
